Desc.eng: Look at these books! Most of them are about the Chimera . See that one? "How to Feed Your Chimera". Could you sum it up for me?
I'll give you a quick summary.
“The Chimera's body is raw Ink-material… and you can't feed a creature of pure magic with ordinary food. They live on magical essences that they smell from miles apart. ”
We should find someone who sells Essence on wholesale price.
So, what should be next? "How to Feed Your Chimera". Sounds promising!
